Kindly Regards,

Elena Kovachki

Administration & Back office Manager

Natural Gas Trading Department

www.tibiel.com/en <http://www.tibiel.com/en> 

Tibiel L.t.d.





 

From: Miroslav Stojanovic <ms@ozbor.cy <mailto:ms@ozbor.cy> >
Sent: Thursday, May 16, 2024 3:35 PM
To: Gas Trade <Gastrade@tibiel.com <mailto:Gastrade@tibiel.com> >; Office <office@tibiel.com <mailto:office@tibiel.com> >; Trade <Trade@tibiel.com <mailto:Trade@tibiel.com> >; Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com <mailto:a.ivanova@tibiel.com> >; Ivailo Simonov <I.Simonov@tibiel.com <mailto:I.Simonov@tibiel.com> >
Cc: ozbor operations <operations@ozbor.cy <mailto:operations@ozbor.cy> >
Subject: Trade confirmation Ozbor > Tibiel, 1 GWh/d BoM III (18.05-31.05), BG VTP

 

Dear Vladislav,

Please confirm the deal below agreed earlier today:

SELLER:                                 OZBOR ENTERPRISES LIMITED

BUYER:                                 TIBIEL

QUANTITY:                          1’000 MWh/day ==> 14’000 Mwh total, flat & firm, 100% ToP

DELIVERY POINT:              BG VTP / registered on BGH secondary market

DELIVERY PERIOD:           BOM (from 06:00 CET 18.05.2024 until 06:00 CET 01.06.2024) / 14 gas days

PRICE:                                 24.80 EUR/MWh

Payment terms:              prepayment in two tranches, due date 17.05.2024 for delivery period 18.05-24.05.2024

                                                and due date 24.05.2024 for delivery period 25.05.-31.05.2024

OTHERS:                             as per attached term sheet

Kindly check and confirm the conditions. We will issue preliminary invoice for first payment later today.

Thank you for the business.

Best regards,

Miroslav Stojanovic

OZBOR ENTERPRISES LIMITED

E-mail: ms@ozbor.cy <mailto:ms@ozbor.cy>  
Tel: +41 79 277 11 84
subject: FW: Trade confirmation Ozbor > Tibiel, 1 GWh/d BoM III (18.05-31.05), BG VTP

June 1ª, 2024. 06:00 CET
Delivery Point
National Virtual Trading Point (BG), (EIC: 58Z-VTPN-NAT-1)
and
The Seller shall be responsible for transporting the gas to the Delivery Point and shall be responsible for paying
Delivery Basis
any and all relevant costs of charges associated with the transportation of the gas up until the Delivery point,
including all charges for any discrepancy it has caused between nominated and delivered quantities, such as
balancing and other relevant charges.
The Buyer shall be responsible for transporting the gas from the Delivery Point to the final sale destination point
and shall be responsible for paying any and all relevant costs of charges associated with the transportation of the
gas after the Delivery Point, inchiding all charges for any discrepancy it has caused between nominated and
delivered quantities, such as balancing and other relevant charges
Title and Risk
Title and Risk shall be transferred at the Delivery Point
Contract
14,000.000 (fourteen thousand) MWh
Quantity
Daily Quantity
1'000.000 (one thousand) MWh
Take or Pay
For the Delivery period Seller shall make available and Buyer shall take and pay for the Daily Quantity.
Cancellation
No cancellation rights on this agreement
Price
The Price (P) shall be expressed in Euro (EUR) per MWh, payable by Buyer for the quantity of natural gas
hereunder shall be calculated as follows:
P = 24,80 EUR/MWh
Invoicing &
Seller shall issue and send to Buyer via e-mail:
Payment Terms
.
not later than 16/05/2024 a first invoice with payment due date 17/05/2024 based on the Contract
Quantity for the deliveries during the period 18.05-24.05.2024 (both days inchided) multiplied by the
Price (P)
.
not later than 22/05/2024 a second invoice with payment due date 24/05/2024 based on the Contract
Quantity during the period 25.05-31.05.2024 (both days included) multiplied by the Price (P)
Nomination
In compliance and accepted by the Bulgarian TSO BULGARTRANGAZ EAD.
Registration
Hub
The present Term Sheet shall be registered by the Parties at the non-anonymous trading segment of Balkan Gas
Goveming Law
The laws of the Republic of Bulgaria shall govern the transaction. Disputes shall be submitted to the
relevant/competent Bulgarian court of justice.
